root.message: The REL_CAL_POLICY field for indicator 3-d-1, translated into en
root.data: Results of the States Parties Self-Assessment Annual Report 2021 are now available in the e-SPAR platform https://extranet.who.int/e-spar and disseminated to other WHO homepages on WHO websites, including the Strategic Partnership for Health Security and Emergency Preparedness (SPH) Portal (https://extranet.who.int/sph/), the Global Health Observatory (https://www.who.int/data/gho ), WHO GPW13 triple billion targets dashboard (https://portal.who.int/triplebillions/ ).
